subequations:
\begin{subequations}
\label{bc}
\bea
\partial_\sigma X^+&=&0  \\
\partial_\sigma X^i+ \partial_i \Phi_a(X^+,X^i) \partial_\tau X^+ + B_{ij} \partial_\tau X^j 
&=& 0   \qquad\mbox{at} ~~
\sigma=\sigma_a\ ,\quad \label{bci}\\
\partial_\sigma X^- - \partial_i \Phi_a(X^+,X^i) ~ \partial_\tau X^i&=& 0 
\eea
\

\begin{subequations}
\bea
p^+ \partial_\sigma X^- &+& \partial_\tau X^i \partial_\sigma X^i = 0 \label{vir1} \\ 
- p^+ \partial_\tau X^- &+& \frac12 \left[ (\partial_\tau X^i)^2 + (\partial_\sigma X^i)^2 \right]
=0 \label{vir2}
\eea
\

\begin{subequations}
\label{bc}
\bea
\partial_\sigma X^+&=&0  \\
\partial_\sigma X^i+ \partial_i \Phi_a(X^+,X^i) \partial_\tau X^+ + B_{ij} \partial_\tau X^j 
&=& 0   \qquad\mbox{at} ~~
\sigma=\sigma_a\ ,\quad \label{bci}\\
\partial_\sigma X^- - \partial_i \Phi_a(X^+,X^i) ~ \partial_\tau X^i&=& 0 
\eea
\

\begin{subequations}
\bea
p^+ \partial_\sigma X^- &+& \partial_\tau X^i \partial_\sigma X^i = 0 \label{vir1} \\ 
- p^+ \partial_\tau X^- &+& \frac12 \left[ (\partial_\tau X^i)^2 + (\partial_\sigma X^i)^2 \right]
=0 \label{vir2}
\eea
